channel.title: Energy on Mahmood Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in Energy on Mahmood Hasan

item.title: Data Visualization With Software R
item.description: #For rough writing #{r, echo=FALSE} #"Hello World!" # library(readxl) Solar_CapacityVsLCOE <- read_excel("D:/Website/Data/Solar_CapacityVsLCOE.xlsx", sheet = "OnShoreWind (2)") library("gapminder") library("ggplot2") library("gganimate") library("ggthemes") library("dplyr") library("png") library(gifski) WindCost <- Solar_CapacityVsLCOE %>% ggplot(aes(x = Capacityfactor, y=IntalledCost, size = LCOE, color=Country)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.7, stroke =0) + theme_fivethirtyeight()+ scale_size(range = c(2, 12), guide = "none") + scale_x_log10() + labs(title = "Wind Power Installation Cost Vs Capacity Factor", x = "Capacity Factor (%)", y = "Installation Cost (USD/KWatt)", caption = "Animation Plot")+ theme(axis.
